content: these fingerless mitts are quick to make and take only one skein of sport or fingering weight yarn the majority of the mitt is made of the griddle stitch - alternating single_crochet and double_crochet stitches and swapping the order each row the cuff is a back loop only single_crochet ribbing this pattern is one size only but you can adjust the size by using different yarn or hook sizes or take a look at the pattern pdf for some recommendations for size adjustments
